allow:
Bash(git commit -m "MVP iOS PhotoSweeper - initial

- PhotoSweeperCore package: pHash, Laplacian, Entropy, Clustering, Vision integration
- PhotoSweeperApp: Onboarding, Scan, Results (2 tabs), Paywall, Deletion
- Background tasks (BGProcessingTask) with scan resumption
- Local notifications on scan completion
- StoreKit non-consumable IAP (€12.99, no family sharing)
- PHPhotoLibrary deletion to Recently Deleted (30 days)
- Python prototype for Windows validation
- CI workflow for macOS
- Complete documentation")
Bash(git commit -m "Merge: resolve README conflict, keep full PhotoSweeper documentation")
Bash(find PixooApp PixooCore -type f -name "*.swift" -exec sed -i 's/import PhotoSweeperCore/import PixooCore/g' {} +)
Bash(find PixooApp PixooCore -type f -name "*.swift" -exec sed -i 's/PhotoSweeper Pro/Pixoo Pro/g' {} +)

Bash(git commit -m "Rename app to Pixoo: bundle IDs, IAP, BGTask, storekit, modules, docs

- PhotoSweeperApp → PixooApp
- PhotoSweeperCore → PixooCore
- Bundle ID: com.photosweeper.app → com.pixoo.app
- IAP Product: com.pixoo.app.pro.lifetime
- BGTask: com.pixoo.app.scan
- Pixoo Pro - À vie (12,99 €)
- All imports, docs, UI text updated")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix CI: remove circular typealiases, fix Vision import, fix SweeperConfig

- Remove PixooCore.swift typealiases causing circular redeclarations
- Move Vision import to file level in Clustering.swift
- Fix SweeperConfig.aggressive parameters to match private init signature
- All types now exported directly from their files")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix CI: remove circular extension, simplify Vision fallback

- Remove circular computed properties in HeuristicClassifier extension
- Refactor burst label addition to use map instead of mutation
- Simplify Vision distance to return fallback (real computation at app layer)
- Vision FeaturePrintObservation cannot be created from Data in package
- Real Vision distance computed via VisionService in app layer")
